system.availability: Once activated if it damages a character they must make -10 toughness test. If failed in 1d5 Rounds scarabs burrow into their brain and take control. Control is either subtle (-20 Willpower test to resist, 3 DoF+ become aware of presence), or overt (+0 Willpower Test or completely fall under control). Overt use causes burnout of scarabs after 1d10 minutes, causing 1d10 fatigue to victim.
system.cost: Once Set, waits until receiving commands from Necron controller (infinite range).  Use Canoptek Locust statblock with 10 Wounds and No Psychic Plague. Always Best Quality.
